Package components

Class CardTests

java.lang.Object
components.CardTests
public class CardTests extends Object
The CardTests class contains JUnit tests for the Card class. It includes tests for methods related to retrieving and manipulating card attributes, as well as checking the validity of moves with respect to Uno game rules.
